channel.title: How can i play with other people
channel.description: i really want to play with my friend, is there way we can play together? would we be able to play together if he playes on my server? but if he does and he doesnt join, is there any oither way we can play together?

item.title: How can i play with other people
item.dc:creator: @Xbox_Modder Xbox Modder
item.description:
@Xbox_Modder wrote:

Go to “Server Advertisement” and look for servers that claim they don’t lag and are 24/7 or something…

Read full topic
item.source: How can i play with other people

item.title: How can i play with other people
item.dc:creator: @feebleman feebleman
item.description:
@feebleman wrote:

ok can anyone tell me a good server i could go on cause ive been on some but they suck cause they lag, if theres a good one, give me the ip address ty

Read full topic

item.title: How can i play with other people
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

Well maybe him and you can go to a server together.
Heres a server status page http://aahost.nozonenet.com/serverstatus/serverstatus.php

Link to a webclient : http://moparisthebest.com/

Picture how to use webclient

Red is where you put the server IP
Blue is where you put the port

Read full topic

item.title: How can i play with other people
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Sick >.<

Anyways, if you mean play together ‘on a server’, then make a server, or join one that you can play online with, not like Hybridscape.
